title: Hardware Store Stocks Up on Rope and Duct Tape for 'Fifty Shades of Grey' Release
subtitle: Rumor: Hardware stores in the UK are stocking up on rope for the release of the 'Fifty Shades of Grey' movie.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The UK hardware store B&Q warned its staff about a surge in rope, duct tape, and tie down sales before the release of the
